ADDITIONAL_DESCRIPTION:
Sqwincher powder concentrate quenches and satisfies thirst and replenishes hardworking bodies with essential electrolytes. available in regular formula and ZERO, add a pack to your equipment inventory before your day’s shift. Quick and easy to mix for rapid serve and intake. Three convenient sizes for any serving need. Add a Sqwincher cooler and/or cups for a complete hydration solution.

ADVANTAGES:

  • 2.5 ZERO contains zero sugar and zero calories
    • Quick and easy to mix
  • 3 step cooler ready
    		• add water, add Powder Pack and stir

Sqwincher goes beyond the call of duty for your traditional electrolyte replenishment with a diverse group of specialty products. These items also offer a single-serve application with on-the-go results. Easily take these specialty items along by packing them with your daily items or gear. Exceed your hydration needs with great quality and effective delivery of electrolytes to the body.

ADVANTAGES

  • Quickly cools body temperature
  • Healthier than frozen sugar ice by replenishing electrolytes
  • Convenient option when on the go
  • Available in regular or ZERO (no sugar, no calories

Single Serve is the "express lane" of hydration for on-the-go when you need it most. This convenient, effective way to rehydrate offers multiple flavor choices to avoid flavor limitations. By eliminating the cooler, you save beverage maintenance time and gain control of worker usage.

Sqwincher Fast Pack multi-talented pouch is as easy as hydration gets. The pouch doubles as a cup! All you have to do is add water to the mix and you're good to go.

ADVANTAGES

  • Package doubles as a drinking cup
  • Sanitary delivery method prevents contamination
  • No mixing required
  • No cups required
  • Single serve allows minimal waste
  • Convenient option when on-the-go
  • Great way to offer multiple flavors

Sqwincher liquid concentrate is a great addition to any drinking water supply area for easy electrolyte consumption. liquid concentrate is perfect for pre-mixed coolers, as well as individual servings, without the stirring. Sqwincher 64oz. offers an exceptional single-serve method with the help of Sqwincher Servastation and pump Spout.

ADVANTAGES:

  • Can be mixed in individual cups or pre-mixed to make a large amount
  • No stirring required
  • For individual/single-serve mix (pump spout needed), attach pump spout and place near water source (one full pump dispenses proper amount for one 10 oz. serving)

Ice down the cooler and make every minute count by packing it with Sqwincher Ready to Drink. Bottled or canned, it's ready. Twist and chug or pop a cap for the awesome taste of Sqwincher and an optimal blend of electrolytes. Enjoy the great taste of Sqwincher ZERO formula in Ready to Drink. Those watching calories and sugars, or diabetics, can enjoy Sqwincher and keep the body going.

ADVANTAGES

  • No wait time, open and drink
  • No prep or mixing
  • Resealable bottles
  • Non-resealable cans, one-time-use

Single Serve is the "express lane" of hydration for on-the-go when you need it most. This convenient, effective way to rehydrate offers multiple flavor choices to avoid flavor limitations. By eliminating the cooler, you save beverage maintenance time and gain control of worker usage.

Qwik Stik ZERO is a one-man hydration solution without the sugar or calories. Simply rip open a pack, pour into a bottle of water and let the hydration hit the spot.

ADVANTAGES:

  • Simply add to bottled water, shake well
  • ZERO sugar, ZERO calories
  • 8-10 and 20 oz. servings
  • Fast on-the-go hydration
  • Easy to pack with minimal waste

Introducing Sqwincher Hot Stik! Each great-tasting serving is filled with essential electrolytes, minerals and vitamins to help to stimulate the body and keep it protected during increased exposure to the cold. Meant to be served as a hot beverage, each serving of Hot Stix electrolyte beverage contains 10 calories and 3g of carbs. Just add to 8-10 oz of hot water and mix.

ADVANTAGES

  • 10 Stiks per tube
  • Hot serve electrolyte beverage
  • Great cold stress and winter dehydration preventative
  • Contains B and C vitamins
  • Green Tea and Orange Spice Tea contains natural caffeine
